Package edu.sjsu.cs.ghost151

Interface Summary
BoardRenderer A BoardRenderer implementation is responsible for creating a String representation of the Board suitable for printing to stdout.
GhostMovementAlgorithm A GhostMovementAlgorithm uses a Ghost's explored positions and other information a Ghost has to determine the next position on the map the Ghost should move towards.
 

Class Summary
Board The Board class represents the environment for the simulation.
BoardObject A BoardObject is the basic unit stored within the Board.
BoardPosition BoardPosition is a simple utility class storing row/column coordinates on the Board.
ConsoleGameDriver ConsoleGameDriver is responsible for instantiating the Game instance and requesting the number of ghosts the user would like in the simulation.
Ghost The Ghost is a specialized BoardObject that has the ability to look at its surroundings, communicate with other ghosts, and move around the board.
GhostVisionBoardRenderer Renders the Board in "Ghost Vision" - which masks any spaces not explored by the ghosts in the game with a hash mark, except for the Target and the Ghosts themselves
InvisibleBoardRenderer  
LinearGhostMovementAlgorithm The LinearGhostMovementAlgorithm scans linearly outward in all 8 directions from the Ghost and determines the nearest unexplored space in those directions.
NearestGhostMovementAlgorithm The NearestGhostMovementAlgorithm chooses the nearest unexplored space to the Ghost and moves toward it.
RandomGhostMovementAlgorithm The RandomGhostMovementAlgorithm chooses a random unexplored space and moves towards it.
ScoredBoardPosition A ScoredBoardPosition
StandardBoardRenderer Renders the Board instance in the "standard" way, which means that each object is represented by its type representation.
WindowGameDriver ConsoleGameDriver is responsible for instantiating the Game instance and requesting the number of ghosts the user would like in the simulation.
 

Enum Summary
BoardDirection The BoardDirection class stores a pair of row/column offsets that indicate an ordinal direction on the Board grid.
BoardObjectType BoardObjectType is an enumeration of the potential kinds of objects that may be stored on a Board grid.
Game The Game class contains the core logic for our simulation.
GhostMovementAlgorithmType The GhostMovementAlgorithmType is an enumeration factory for creating appropriate instances of the GhostMovementAlgorithm interface.
